Name: Satyam Kumar
Position: Flutter developer
Data: Hello everyone,Here's a good opportunity for all Flutter developers out there.My companyFederal Soft Systems Inc.is hiring for Flutter developer role.( Note: Please Don't dm me asking about salary🙃. It will mostly be as per industry standards and based on your skills🙌. If selected, discuss salary with HR✌️)Now Here's Flutter JD and skill requirement:1. 1+ years of experience in Flutter app development.2. Should have deployed at least one Flutter app on playstore and/or appstore.3. Strong understanding of state management in Flutter – provider / getx.4. Understanding of firebase – authentication, push notification etc.5. REST Api integration, handling of json, html and xml response with http or dio package(preferred).6. Efficient with model classes, Json serialization (toJson), Json deserialization (fromJson).7. Manage the code and project on Git in order to keep in sync with other team members and managers.8. Can work with third party packages and plugins.9. Knowledge of animations in flutter is preferred.10. Knowledge of OOPs concepts.11. Debug and solve bugs.12. Strong programming and analytical skills.13. Suggest new features and/or enhancements.14. Knowledge of testing in Flutter is preferred.15. Good understanding skill16. Good communication skillsNote: Dm me your Resume if you meet the above requirements. Only Resume with links to your Flutter app projects is preferred as I would like to see what all projects you have done in Flutter before taking your interview.Thanks ✌️.
